attributes.action: MORE RIGHTS FOR FATHERS SEEING THERE CHILDREN
attributes.additional_details:
This is for mr norgrove to reconsider his judgement concerning his family law choice regarding shared parenting and how is seems very discriminating towards fathers. we are dads who want to play a active role in our childs life! in a world that promotes equal rights why sould fathers be discriminated against?

www.daddadsagainstdiscrimination.co.uk
